This renders TiKZ diagrams in markdown.


```{.tikz embed_mode="link" scale=3}
\node[draw, circle] (A) at (0,0) {A};
\node[draw, circle] (B) at (2,0) {B};
\node[draw, circle] (C) at (4,0) {C};
\node[draw, circle] (seven) at (5,0) {7};
\draw[->] (A) -- (B);
\draw[->] (B) -- (C);
\draw[->] (C) -- (A);
```
